author: Special Correspondent
text:
Angered over his mother not willing to hand over the family property to him, a mason, P. Malaichamy alias Bose (47) reportedly set his sexagenarian mother on fire at Valayankulam on Monday.

The police said that Bose who was living in Nedumadurai, had picked a quarrel with his mother, Mookammal (65).

When she did not heed to his demand for handing over the family property, he doused her with kerosene and set her afire.

Neighbours rescued the woman. She was admitted to the Government Rajaji hospital with 20 per cent burns, the police said.

Case booked

The Perungudi police have booked a case of attempt to murder and are on the lookout for the accused.
